scholarships.title: Reliance Foundation Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: 2nd-year UG (CSE, IT, ECE), Min CGPA 8.0, No backlogs, Family income < ₹8L
scholarships.description: The Reliance Foundation Scholarship program aims to support meritorious students in pursuing higher education in technology and engineering fields.

scholarships.title: Women Techmakers Fellowship
scholarships.eligibility: Female students UG/PG (CSE, IT, ECE, EEE) 2nd–4th year
scholarships.description: Google's Women Techmakers program provides scholarships to women studying computer science, computer engineering, or closely related technical fields.

scholarships.title: AICTE Smart India Fellowship
scholarships.eligibility: 3rd-year UG (CSE, IT, ECE, EEE, Mech, Civil)
scholarships.description: Fellowship program for students working on innovative projects that solve real-world problems.

scholarships.title: UNESCO Women in Science Fellowship
scholarships.description: Fellowship program to support women researchers in STEM fields.

scholarships.title: Adobe India’s Women in Tech Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: Female UG/PG (CSE, IT, ECE, Data Science, Math) final year
scholarships.description: The Adobe India Women in Tech Scholarship provides funding for female students pursuing technical degrees in India and offers mentorship, internship, and access to career development opportunities.

scholarships.title: Nutanix Advancing Women in Technology Scholarship
scholarships.description: The Nutanix Advancing Women in Technology Scholarship supports women pursuing undergraduate or graduate degrees in technical fields.

scholarships.title: Pragati Scholarship (Women)
scholarships.eligibility: Female UG all years in technical education
scholarships.description: The Pragati Scholarship aims to assist meritorious women pursuing technical education from economically weaker sections of society.

scholarships.title: Amazon Future Engineer Scholarship (Women)
scholarships.description: The Amazon Future Engineer Scholarship supports first-year female students in India pursuing undergraduate degrees in Computer Science Engineering and related disciplines.

scholarships.title: Kotak Kanya Scholarship 2025-26
scholarships.description: Govt-industry partnered virtual internships

scholarships.title: Hero FinCorp Scholarship
scholarships.description: Funding + mentorship + paid internship

scholarships.title: B-Airtel Foundation Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: 1st-year UG engineering, income < ₹8.5L, preference to girls, orphans, transgender
scholarships.description: Funding + possible internship

scholarships.title: HDFC Bank Parivartan’s ECSS Program
scholarships.description: Solve real-world problems, get internships

scholarships.title: Muskaan Scholarship Program (VCPL)
scholarships.description: 2–3 month coding period for OSS orgs

scholarships.title: Bharati Airtel Scholarship
scholarships.description: 12-week summer internship for early-year CS/IT students

scholarships.title: Loius Scholarship
scholarships.eligibility: B.E., B.Tech, Diploma, ITI, M.Tech, M.Sc.
scholarships.description: National tech competition leading to PPO

scholarships.title: HOPE Scholarship
scholarships.description: Diversity initiative for tech students

scholarships.title: Hero Scholarship (Ramakant Hunjal)
scholarships.description: Annual hiring challenge

scholarships.title: Mirae Asset Scholarship
scholarships.description: Coding competition leading to internship

scholarships.title: Kotak Junior Scholarship
scholarships.description: Hackathon by JPMC leading to internships/PPO

scholarships.title: Satya Scholarship
scholarships.description: Software development internship

scholarships.title: IDFC Bank MBA Scholarship
scholarships.description: Women-centric tech coding competitions

scholarships.title: Kind Circle Scholarship
scholarships.description: Finance + tech internship

scholarships.title: Blue Star Foundation (Mohan T. Advani)
scholarships.description: Remote OSS contribution internship
